summary: with this mod i hope to add unique and challenging battles that require tactics and practice to beat unlike the cakewalk dragon battles vanilla offered.
descriptionHtml:
I have added over 5 boss battles for skyrim so far each one unique and challenging, i have added boss mobs and groups of monsters that will appear on rare occasion in your journey across skyrim to challenge your power.
so far i have. i will leave a few of the mobs out to suprise you.

verthmin the destroyer, verthmin is a much older large dragon who has learned a multitude of spells and tricks to defeat you. he has made his den some where in the north near winterhold and will attack any travelers that happen to come upon the ancient ruins that he has made his lair into.

the twin dragons. these two twin dragons live together away from any cities on the mountains and have mastered fire and lightning.

the ghost dragon. the ghost of this dragon haunts blackreach and the falmer very little is known of it.
author: skylor01
